structure.unit: ARTICLE CXIV. COMMUNITY REDEVELOPMENT REQUEST POLICY

text.section:
Sec. 2-1742. Children's Trust exempted.
For all community redevelopment agencies created by the Board after the establishment of The Children's Trust independent special taxing district, the Board hereby, in its sole discretion pursuant to ยง163.387(2)(d)(1), exempts The Children's Trust, an independent special taxing district, from the provisions of ยง163.387(2)(a), F.S. for the term of collection of The Children's Trust ad valorem tax, including any extension of this ad valorem tax levy which is approved by the voters of Miami-Dade County.
